洡字的基本解释

洡
lěi
古同“??”。

洡
lèi
浸染。

洡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lèi］
［《集韻》盧隊切，去隊，來。］
渍染，传染。
[②]［lěi］
［《集韻》魯猥切，上賄，來。］
县名。即耒阳。在今湖南省。

洡字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　洡； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页621第04
【集韻】魯猥切，音磊。與䣂同。洡陽，縣名，在桂陽。【漢書】作耒。本水名。【水經注】耒水，發源出汝城縣東烏龍白騎山。　又盧對切，音類。相漬染也。

洡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
洡字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lèi］
["Ji Yun" Lu team cut, go to the team, come. ]
Stains, infections.
[②] [lěi]
["Ji Yun" Lu Weiqie, bribe, come. ]
County name. That is Leiyang. In today's Hunan Province.
Huan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　洡; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 621 04
[Ji Yun] Lu Yuqie, Yin Lei. Same as 䣂. Huanyang, the county name, is in Guiyang. [Hanshu] As Lei. The name of the water. [Notes on Water Classics] Lei Shui originated from Baiqi Mountain in Dongwulong, Rucheng County.　 Lu cut again, phonology. Also stained with stains.
